blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: in waiting
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RCOH4k

by freckliephil

“So Dan won’t come in to the room as Dan, and Phil feels like Phil for the first time in a really long time, and the bed sheets are on the floor, where they’ll probably remain for weeks. There’s no other place for them in this weird, confusing waiting room that stands between who they were, who they are, and the rest of their careers as some version of all of it mixed together.”

Words: 1134, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: prose, Introspection


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RCOH4k

your as evil as me and you know it
summary: On October 16 of this year hello internet is ten years old. We have been cyber bulling dan for ten years. So on the 15 of...
body: On October 16 of this year hello internet is ten years old. We have been cyber bulling dan for ten years. So on the 15 of October I suggest that we just spam him with nice videos of cats and puppy then on October 16 we just spam him with hello internet disguised as various videos with message of love something like ‘happy ten years on YouTube dan heres a nice cat video’ just finally cross that last line and make him loss any faith he had left for humanity.

blog.name: natigail
blog.title: the sky is clear - it’s pretty queer
blog.description: Nina, she/her, 24, Denmark. Always writing. My fics. About me

title: My 2018 Phanfics
body:
I have already made a longer summary post of my phanfics of this year. However, with the Phanfic Awards just around the corner, I wanted to make a shorter and simpler version to reblog a couple of times in case any of you wanted to nominate any of my works. As always, make sure you nominate your actual favourites in each category! So many good fics have been written this year and I have another list of my favourite new phanfics I read in 2018.

Let Go Of The Reins - Chaptered, +80k, AO3 only, AU, Horse owner!Phil, Stablehand!Dan, Fluff, Light Angst, Strangers to Friends to Lovers

The Pianist Everyone Is Talking About… Is My Husband - Chaptered, +25k, AO3 only, AU, Pianist!Dan, BBC Employee!Phil, Fluff, Husbands, Secret Relationship

nine years - One Shot, 9k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship

stars in the sky; galaxies in your eyes - One Shot, 9k, AO3 & tumblr, AU, University students!Phan, Fluff, Existential Crisis, First Meeting

A Different First Meeting WITH DOGS! - One Shot, 8k, AO3 & tumblr, AU, Dog shelter owner!Phil, Actor!Dan, Dogs, Pure Fluff, First Meeting

In service of doing better things - One Shot, 3k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship, Dramatic December

An Island in the Mediterranean - One Shot, 2k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship, Holiday

Just a Haircut - One Shot, 2k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Light Angst, Established Relationship

One Slow Lift, Two Tired Boys & Flirting Drunk Women - One Shot, 2k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship, Tour

Grown on each other like mould - One Shot, 2k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Domestic Fluff, Established Relationship

Staying hydrated is nice & being minty is fun - One Shot, 1k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship, Tour

In the only way we know how - One Shot, 1k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship, Tour

He thought the view was pretty but I thought he was prettier - One Shot, 1k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship, Tour

One of the longest possible flights for a human - One Shot, 1k, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Fluff, Established Relationship, Tour

Let’s Celebrate Napping Day ZzZzZz… - Drabble, 500 words, AO3 & tumblr, Reality, Pure Fluff, Established Relationship, Phandom Fic Fest

Vote at the Phanfics Awards 2018 

(I hope you take the time to vote of you read and enjoy phanfics because I know that any of the authors would appreciate it!)

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: You know I’ve never seen two people who like board games so much. I’ve been rewatching some videos and realized how many board...
question: You know I’ve never seen two people who like board games so much. I’ve been rewatching some videos and realized how many board games they actually have.
answer: Every group has a thing I guess. When I hang out with one group of my friends, we drink wine, play cards against humanity, watch Jenna marbles, and cry about our feelings. When I hang out with a different group of my friends, we drink vodka and go fishing. Apparently when Dan and Phil hang out with friends, they play board games.

reblog.comment: Every group has a thing I guess. When I hang out with one group of my friends, we drink wine, play cards against humanity, watch Jenna marbles, and cry about our feelings. When I hang out with a different group of my friends, we drink vodka and go fishing. Apparently when Dan and Phil hang out with friends, they play board games.

When I hang out with a different group of my friends, we drink vodka and go fishing. Apparently when Dan and Phil hang out with friends, they play board games.

blog.name: cryingphanti
blog.title: wow
blog.description: I'm a phanti blog i guess whats up

summary: Can you please f*cking explain why phannies are obsessed with drawing Dan on dresses? effing cringey!
question: Can you please f*cking explain why phannies are obsessed with drawing Dan on dresses? effing cringey!
answer:
I don’t know. I personnaly think if its a good drawing it’s not really cringe. I dont know what dan thinks of it. He is probably neutral about it and i believe he really doesnt care about gender roles, at least thats what he says. so whatever

If people want to draw him in a dress or in girl clothes then they can. I dont really mind that. But i think it has something to do what how people idealise how dan is when they dont really know who he really is.

reblog.comment:

If people want to draw him in a dress or in girl clothes then they can. I dont really mind that. But i think it has something to do what how people idealise how dan is when they dont really know who he really is.

If people want to draw him in a dress or in girl clothes then they can. I dont really mind that. But i think it has something to do what how people idealise how dan is when they dont really know who he really is.

!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

title: dipping in
body:
E

food play, established relationship, pwp

2.7k

“So many dips,” Phil says. “You’ll never use them all.”

“Wanna bet?”


This started as a joke in my group chat about Dan and his condiments and then it became… this. I was going through my wips to see what I wanted to discard over on @agingphangirlextras and decided I would finish this one.

Thank you to the lovely @capriciouscrab for beta'ing for me :)

[ao3 Link]

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: The more I read people finding the  most idiotic 'proof' the more I laugh, seriously! What actually concerns me is grown ass...
question: The more I read people finding the  most idiotic 'proof' the more I laugh, seriously! What actually concerns me is grown ass 30-something (even 40 something) grown ass woman with KIDS fantasizing over the sexuality of 2 dudes on the internet. Having podcasts about them and even going to the extent of making allegations about how horrible and abusive Dan's parents are with NO PROOF. Sometimes I feel that the phandom is submerged in a deep cult like hive mentality..Am I the only one?
answer:
You are not the only one.


I will say, it’s one thing for a bunch of teens to be obsessing over Dan and Phil’s sexualities/love lives, because hey, they’re young, it’s likely that they’ve never been told that what they’re doing is kinda weird and problematic.


But when you’ve got full blown grown ups doing the same shit? Nah. Y’all should know better. You’ve had plenty of time, in your half a century of existing, to figure out that minding your own damn business is what all the cool kids are up to these days.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: phanfictionevents
blog.title: Phanfiction Events
blog.description:
We host various events for writers in the phandom! From prompt weeks to blind-gos to remixes (and more), there's something for everyone!

Current Event | FAQ

summary:
Welcome to the Phanfiction Events: Remix Relay! 
We’re excited to bring to you a whole new event (or so we believe) that should...
body:
Welcome to the Phanfiction Events: Remix Relay!

We’re excited to bring to you a whole new event (or so we believe) that should be super fun and a great experience for everyone!

What is a remix relay?

  • A remix relay is just like writing a fic…but with some twists! All you have to do is sign up via the form that is linked below, and then we’ll send out a mass prompt for everyone to follow. The prompt will be simple and easy (something like 2009!phan). Each week of the event, we will send you what’s called a remix! This is a prompt that’s been submitted by someone else that we’ll be distributing randomly to the other authors. This is where the fun part comes in: once you receive your prompt, it’s your job to find a creative way to add it into your original fic, and the cycle continues! TLDR: You start with a prompt we provide you, periodically a remix will happen and you’ll have a new prompt you have to incorporate into your fic! 

How does this work exactly? 

  • You will sign up and we’ll put your name on a list. On the first day of the event, we’ll email the prompt that everyone needs to follow. After one week, we’ll make a post announcing the first remix. This just means you’ll be receiving a new prompt that you have to include in your fic. The remix will happen twice over the three weeks.
  • We encourage that you begin to write as soon as the initial prompt is revealed, however, you can also wait until all remixes have been given to you! There is also no minimum word count so write as little or as much as you’d like!
  • If you’re still confused: here is an example scenario. Our initial prompt reveal is Dan and Phil doing a radio show. The first remix happens and you get the prompt: Dan and Phil adopting a child. The second remix you get is Dan and Phil go on a road trip. So in the end, the fic you have to write has to incorporate Dan and Phil doing a radio show, adopting a child, and going on a road trip! 

Where do I sign up?

  • You can sign up on this form here!
  • After signing up, or if you don’t want to sign up but still want to participate, head to this form to send us some prompts to go into the bank as remixes!

Do we need a beta?

  • Yes, you do. But don’t worry! If you don’t have one, we will be doing a beta directory page! If you want to be a beta and be put on this page, fill out this form. Once we have the page up and running, it’ll be updated continuously!

How long is this lasting?

  • Sign Up’s Open on (today): January 18th
  • Sign Up’s Close on: January 23rd
  • Writing Begins and Initial Prompt is revealed: January 24th
  • Remix One: January 31st
  • Remix Two: February 7th
  • Posting: The week of February 10th

*Anytime during the week of February 10th, you can post your fic and submit it to us! After February 17th, we will not be accepting any other submissions for us to reblog onto the blog. But you’re still welcome to post!*

title: In April - Sick (Chapter 1 Part 1)
body:
The millions, billions, trillions of drops of rain cover the capital at night. Clouds hide the stars but have a hard time hiding the light reflected from the full moon above the 2000-year-old city. The ever grey skied metropolis was shrouded in darkness and falling water at the time Dan was walking home from the store.

Rushing to get home, the curly, brown-haired man began to speed walk through the rain to his shared apartment, groceries in hand. Cold rain falls on the tall young adult as he walks, sending shivers all throughout his body with every drop that touches his skin. It almost made him numb, the rain and the cold air combined, very much like being nipped at by a child with ice in its mouth. With this rain came the disappointment Dan felt in himself for not grabbing an umbrella. He was well aware it was supposed to rain, yet he was so persistent on leaving as soon as possible to grab a few essentials. He told himself the rain wouldn’t come for another few hours or so. How wrong he was.

Walking into his apartment soaked with the tears of the night sky, Dan made it very obvious to his friend Phil that he wouldn’t have time to talk. Only time for a slow, warm shower and a very long awaited YouTube binge fest. Phil was very compliant, not to anyone’s surprise, but he felt a little sad. He had been looking forward to talking with his friend all day, but all he’d gotten was a sharp “I don’t have time, Phil.” There was nothing wrong with this though, as Phil could very easily understand why Dan was so worn out. He was too after all that touring, but he still felt it necessary to communicate. Phil sat in the lounge and continued to edit a video for his YouTube channel while Dan took his shower. The two best friends spent the rest of their day living as though the other wasn’t even nearby.

reblog.comment:
The millions, billions, trillions of drops of rain cover the capital at night. Clouds hide the stars but have a hard time hiding the light reflected from the full moon above the 2000-year-old city. The ever grey skied metropolis was shrouded in darkness and falling water at the time Dan was walking home from the store.

Rushing to get home, the curly, brown-haired man began to speed walk through the rain to his shared apartment, groceries in hand. Cold rain falls on the tall young adult as he walks, sending shivers all throughout his body with every drop that touches his skin. It almost made him numb, the rain and the cold air combined, very much like being nipped at by a child with ice in its mouth. With this rain came the disappointment Dan felt in himself for not grabbing an umbrella. He was well aware it was supposed to rain, yet he was so persistent on leaving as soon as possible to grab a few essentials. He told himself the rain wouldn’t come for another few hours or so. He had been looking forward to talking with his friend all day, but all he’d gotten was a sharp “I don’t have time, Phil.” There was nothing wrong with this though, as Phil could very easily understand why Dan was so worn out. He was too after all that touring, but he still felt it necessary to communicate. Phil sat in the lounge and continued to edit a video for his YouTube channel while Dan took his shower. The two best friends spent the rest of their day living as though the other wasn’t even nearby.
